## Installation

You can install the [development version of **breaktime**](https://github.com/rossellhayes/breaktime) from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pkg_install("rossellhayes/breaktime")
```

## Overview

Provides interactive timers that work in the console.
Includes a timer, stopwatch, [Pomodoro timer](https://francescocirillo.com/products/the-pomodoro-technique), and a work timer that uses an original method.
